short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect your CRM to Cisco Finesse Contact Center platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
INTENDED FOR ENTERPRISE USE ONLY

THIS EXTENSION WORKS WITH THE SPECIFIC VERSION 6.2 AND NEWER OF THE DESKTOP APPLICATION 2Ring Gadgets for Cisco Finesse
---------------------------------------------------------------

2Ring Extension for Contact Center Softphones enhances the reach of 2Ring contact center products to 3rd party web applications running in Google Chrome.

The Extension enables the communication of 2Ring Gadgets and thus of Cisco Finesse with various CRM systems and with many other websites and web-based systems. 

CRM systems natively supported by the Extension include Salesforce Sales Cloud, MS Dynamics and ServiceNow.
